article_title: My Plan to Raise Growth and Incomes
article_text:
The fundamental question facing the country right now: Why has the income of middle-class Americans failed to grow for 15 years?

Until we answer this question and fix this problem, the anxiety and unhappiness that weighs on middle-class America will not be resolved. We will continue to see mistrust between the people and their government. We will continue to see America weakened in the world.

The key to boosting the income of...
